sentences.english: Put them all together, and you have Xiangyang , a city beautiful and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 所有這一切，組成了襄陽，一個美麗又寧靜的城市。

sentences.english: He led his vulnerable army to Xiangyang and Wuchang, Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 他帶領他的弱勢軍襄陽與武昌，湖北。

sentences.english: Story of Longzhong Yangyang, undulating hills, vast Lin.
sentences.chinese: 襄陽城西的隆中，羣山起伏，林海茫茫。

sentences.english: Wang Hualiang, male, Xiangyang, Hubei Province churyo engineering machinery company Chairman.
sentences.chinese: 王華良，男，湖北省襄陽忠良工程機械公司董事長。

sentences.english: This photo was shoot in Shanghai Xiang-Yang park at 1959.
sentences.chinese: 上圖攝於一九五九年在上海襄陽公園。

sentences.english: The people in Xiangyang cherish this worthy of townsmen, more because he is the poet of the people.
sentences.chinese: 襄陽人懷念這位“鄉賢”，更因爲他是人民的詩人。
